paper.title: Solving Large Sparse Linear Systems over Finite Fields

keywords.keyword: Quantum algorithm for linear systems of equations
Derivation of the conjugate gradient method

paper.abstract: Many of the fast methods for factoring integers and computing discrete logarithms require the solution of large sparse linear systems of equations over finite fields. This paper presents the results of implementations of several linear algebra algorithms. It shows that very large sparse systems can be solved efficiently by using combinations of structured Gaussian elimination and the conjugate gradient, Lanczos, and Wiedemann methods.
